snippet: U.S. Senate Democratic Leader Chuck Schumer on Monday called on the Department of Justice's inspector general to probe any possible political interference in its investigation of contacts between President Donald Trump's associates and Russia....

headline.main: Text: President Trump’s Executive Order on Immigration
headline.print_headline: Text: President Trump’s Executive Order on Immigration

lead_paragraph: U.S. Senate Democratic Leader Chuck Schumer on Monday called on the Department of Justice's inspector general to probe any possible political interference in its investigation of contacts between President Donald Trump's associates and Russia.
